page.title: 03Family life in Brewham.
page.content: Our{family}consists of four people, my sister Jenny, mum, dad and me. I am eleven and Jenny is thirteen. We have two{dogs}aged one year and thirteen years. I have to take the youngest one for a walk every day. Some days we all go to see our {grandparents}who live in{Warminster (about 13 miles away). Our other {grandparents}live in{Maidstone}and, when he was small, my dad lived there too. We have lots of{relatives}and they are scattered about the country (& world). Most of the time we are all doing separate things with dad at work, Jenny at her friends and mum and me doing various things. At mealtimes we don't chat much to dad because usually he's{reading}the newspaper and has the{radio}on and doesn't like being interrupted.
